page.title: 11SCHOOL CARETAKER
page.content: The caretaker in this school has to do certain jobs. He's the one who has to open and close the school;he also helps the cleaners tidy up the place, and mends all the damaged things. Sometimes somebody may come in to the building and if they get lost he will show them the way to go. When a teacher needs something that they can't get at that moment he gets it for them. Our caretaker's name is Mr. Hoy. He has one son. I once saw him mending Miss Rich's car because it would not start. I guess that was in a bit of spare time because I know he is a hard working man because I hardly ever see him.
